tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  waste_amount DECIMAL,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE waste_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR,
  report_date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR,
  waste_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_status VARCHAR,
  compliance_details VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE waste_management_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR,
  waste_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
  compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  violation_type VARCHAR,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR,
  site_address VARCHAR,
  site_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR,
  agency_address VARCHAR,
  contact_person VARCHAR
)
